question: Banos de Agua Santa tourist centre is located in which country?
explanation: Banos de Agua Santa is a major and popular tourist centre of Ecuador. It is widely considered as the Gateway of Amazon as it is the last city still located in the mountain range before reaching the jungle and other towns that are located in the Amazon river basin. It is located at the foothills of Tungurahua Volcano. Through this city, tourists can explore Llanganates National Park
